Material used.Description: siRNA was used to downregulate DJ-1, and over-expression vectors for wild-type and L166P mutant DJ-1 were introduced.

Readout description.Result Description: Wild-type DJ-1 over-expression rescued cell death induced by hydrogen peroxide.
L166P mutant DJ-1 over-expression failed to rescue cell death.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 over-expression served as a positive control for rescue experiments.

Basic negative control.Description: L166P mutant DJ-1 over-expression and siRNA-treated cells served as negative controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell death rescue by wild-type DJ-1 over-expression.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Failure of L166P mutant DJ-1 to rescue cell death.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Chemical and stressor-induced cell death assay

Material used.Description: Cells were exposed to hydrogen peroxide, ER stress, or proteasome inhibition.

Readout description.Result Description: Wild-type DJ-1 reduced cell death under stress conditions.
L166P mutant DJ-1 failed to reduce cell death under stress conditions.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 over-expression served as a positive control for stress resistance.

Basic negative control.Description: L166P mutant DJ-1 over-expression and stressor exposure served as negative controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell death reduction by wild-type DJ-1 under stress conditions.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Failure of L166P mutant DJ-1 to reduce cell death under stress conditions.
